attributes.action: reinstate Prof David Nutt as as chair of the ACMD [Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs].
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We deplore the Government's decision to ignore the truth, i.e., scientific evidence, and their blatant attempts to influence independent bodies to enforce their political agenda.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
